headline: Opinion: MAGA loyalists run into trouble
sentences: Mark J. Rozell, dean of the Schar School of Policy and Government at George Mason University, recently wrote for The Post that a potential tripwire? for the two Republicans would be whether they prefer the approach of former president Donald Trump, their party's dominant figure.? They can stick with Trump and look like Vladimir Putin apologists or break with him and watch the base turn on them.
